[DefeatDuel] Deal -50% damage; this Skill cannot Stagger the target with damage or effect
[EndSkill] If this Skill has defeated an enemy, มอบ 2 [ResultEnhancement] and 2 [AttackDmgUp] to all allies, รวมถึงตัวละครนี้, ในเทิร์นถัดไป (once per turn)

levelList.desc:

levelList.name: Like a Roaring Storm
levelList.desc:
[CantDuel]
[CantChangeTarget]
This Skill attacks targets that aren't Hong Lu
Uses the Heishou Pack - Mao Branch to Stagger every Identity except for Hong Lu ในเทิร์นถัดไป; this unit recovers from Stagger
[EndSkill] Ends turn
